thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: Martin's Life came back for the rugby and it's better than ever

author: Jason Brennan
title: Man-Cave | Watch: Martin's Life came back for the rugby and it's better than ever
text:
OK, so we've worked out the formula, we just need massive events which capture the attention and focus of the entire nation at least once a week so that we get way more Sminky Shorts and Martin's Life.
If you hadn't heard, there was a new Sminky Short for the rugby, now we've got a new Martin's Life too.
It's the first we've seen of Martin since the referendum, hopefully we won't have another four month wait to see him again and his parents again.
MORE: Pics: This graph shows just how insanely fit modern rugby players are
MORE: Watch: Underwater rugby is our new favourite sport
MORE: Watch: Sexton, O'Connell, and Henshaw talk about sleeping arrangements and blue movies
